import { Meta } from '@storybook/blocks'
import { ColorPalette, ColorItem } from '@storybook/blocks'
import { getGroupedRootCSSVariables } from '../../src/utils/getGroupedCSSVariables'

<Meta title="Design System/Colors LIGHT" />

# Color palette for `LIGHT` theme

<ColorPalette>
    {
        Object.entries({
            ...getGroupedRootCSSVariables(':root'), // get base colors
            ...getGroupedRootCSSVariables('[data-theme="light"]') // override dark theme colors
        })
        .map(([title, pallette]) => {
            return <ColorItem key={title} title={title} colors={pallette} />
        })
    }
</ColorPalette>
